content: Yes, it's great to see that the entertainment and tourism industry is finding ways to innovate and adapt to the new normal despite the pandemic. While it may take some time before we can enjoy these new attractions in person, it's always exciting to have new places to explore and experiences to enjoy. In the meantime, we must continue to follow the recommended safety guidelines to curb the spread of COVID-19 and protect ourselves and others until it is safe to do so.
